name: TERA: Dawn's Guard Pack
description:
The Xbox-exclusive Dawn's Guard Pack is full of gear and goodies designed to let you play a  TERA valkyrie in style...or to help you take any character from "beginner" to "winner!"

This pack contains an Ultrawing flying drake mount that restores HP and MP, as well as providing a speed buff for nearby players.

The Dawn's Guard Pack also includes a Dawn's Guard costume, consisting of Armor, Helm, and a Shield—plus 15 days of elite status, and 1,000 EMP to spend in the store!
